item.title: In Aleppo, Rebels Give a Sense of What Is to Come for Syria
item.description: Rebel fighters who took control of Aleppo about two weeks ago have promised security and continuity. Prices have skyrocketed, but residents express so...

item.title: As Teenagers, They Protested Trump’s Climate Policy. Now What?
item.description: Some young climate activists who were galvanized under Donald Trump’s first presidency are taking a different approach to his second.

item.title: Trump Picks Kimberly Guilfoyle, His Son’s Fiancée, as Ambassador to Greece
item.description: The announcement came as Donald Trump Jr. has been seen with the socialite Bettina Anderson in Florida.

item.title: Democrats Don’t Have a Shortcut Out of the Wilderness
item.description: The party’s weakened condition leaves it ill-prepared to defend itself against a Republican Party determined to eviscerate liberalism and the left.

item.title: Trump’s Cabinet Picks Show That the G.O.P. Is Hollowed Out, Too
item.description: His cabinet picks show that the Republicans are hollowed out, too.
